effects: Physical damage (1.33x, ATK) to all enemies (ignore cover)
Inflict Stop (30%) for 3 turns on all enemies
name: Violent Cry

desc_short: Deal partial unmitigated damage and stop all enemies

desc_long: Deals damage partially unaffected by DEF to all enemies and chance of stopping them.
對全體敵人發動無視部分防禦的攻擊並追加停止效果。
적 전체에 일부 방어 무시 피해를 주고, 스톱을 부여합니다.
Inflige des dégâts ignorant en partie la DEF de tous les ennemis et augmente les chances de les stopper.
Fügt allen Gegnern Schaden zu, der teilweise die Abwehr umgeht, und stoppt sie.
Inflige daño absoluto parcial y paro a todos los enemigos
